titles.title: Providing for consideration of the Senate amendments to the bill (H.R. 2607) making appropriations for the government of the District of Columbia and other activities chargeable in whole or in part against the revenues of said District for the fiscal year ending September 30, 1998, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 105-403, by Mrs. Myrick.

Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 2607. It shall be in order to consider in the House a single motion that the House concur in the Senate amendment to the text with an amendment printed in the report accompanying this resolution and disagree to the Senate amendment to the title.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 137.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 11/12/1997--Introduced. Provides for the consideration of the Senate amendments to H.R. 2607 (District of Columbia appropriations).
